TopicTitle: [0.24] Distant Object Enhancement 1.3.1 - Planets/satellites in the night sky! (7/29)

Articles.Content: This is a pretty neat mod, just a video I took when I was launching a satellite cause I thought it was cool. I am really enjoying it.
Thanks for making this op, adds another depth to ksp.
Thank you for this plugin! It makes the sky so much Real!
Is there a working telescope mod that is compatible with this mod? As in, letting me see far objects (100k+ m)

Hi everyone, first I would like to say this mod is FANTASTIC! VERY well done to the author.

But I would like to know what settings are most realistic for this mod? I've been playing around the settings but haven't been able to figure out what every setting does.

I've also been having trouble spotting debris/stations etc when they are passing even up to 3km from me, they don't seem to light up (glint). What settings should I be using for best, most realistic effect?

Thanks!
Hi! Does anyone have DistantObject_1.2.zip ? I have not updated to 0.23.5 and DistantObject_1.3.zip not working with 0.23 version of KSP. Google cann't find anything so please help!

Is there a way to make the fading skybox go by whether or not the vessel is in sunlight instead of where the camera is pointing? For instance the only time I want to see stars is when im orbiting around the dark side of a planet.

I've also been having trouble spotting debris/stations etc when they are passing even up to 3km from me, they don't seem to light up (glint). What settings should I be using for best, most realistic effect?

Increase flare size and brightness.

Do you have Toolbar installed? It's a hard dependency at the moment.

I noticed a scaling problem. parts at a distant over 2.3km wont scale at all. so if you have a part that is downscaled a lot, you are going to see huge parts from distance. can this be changed or shouldn't we yust rescale the parts ?

I used

-Distant Object Enhancement (of course)

-Toolbar (of course)

and -KAX (the Rotor has a rescale factor of 0.0125)

I noticed a scaling problem. parts at a distant over 2.3km wont scale at all. so if you have a part that is downscaled a lot, you are going to see huge parts from distance. can this be changed or shouldn't we yust rescale the parts ?

*SNIP*

I used

-Distant Object Enhancement (of course)

-Toolbar (of course)

and -KAX (the Rotor has a rescale factor of 0.0125)

That's actually an issue with resizing parts period. I recall some discussion on the issue at hand in the TweakScale plugin. Basically, the part's model was sized for X so when you scale it down, from a distance it loads in the original scale before it resizes it down in physical range. This may be something to take up with KAX's author and see if they can resize the model so it is scaled to 1 rather than 0.0125 which hopefully should correct the behavior.

Do you have Toolbar installed? It's a hard dependency at the moment.

Yes, I have it installed. And it works with other modules ( with mechjeb, engineer, kerbal alarm clock). To test conflicts I remove other modules - same error.
